dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""I did what?! Can't remember shit,..."
dialogueTree.text: "I did what?! Can't remember shit, I was wasted."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""Aye', cut that shit out, man.""
dialogueTree.text: "Aye', cut that shit out, man."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""Gimme another one!""
dialogueTree.text: "Gimme another one!"

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""Hey, don't be going soft on me.""
dialogueTree.text: "Hey, don't be going soft on me."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""Tell it like it's told, man. Tell..."
dialogueTree.text: "Tell it like it's told, man. Tell it straight."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""No way I'm going back to Jamrock.""
dialogueTree.text: "No way I'm going back to Jamrock."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""If it's titties, then Monica's!""
dialogueTree.text: "If it's titties, then Monica's!"

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""... no worse than the bangers on B..."
dialogueTree.text: "... no worse than the bangers on Boogie Street."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""*This* is gonna make a hell of a s..."
dialogueTree.text: "*This* is gonna make a hell of a sad tattoo..."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""Theo went like he lived -- fast an..."
dialogueTree.text: "Theo went like he lived -- fast and hard. Tough old man."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""The Hardie boys are *unfuckable* n..."
dialogueTree.text: "The Hardie boys are *unfuckable* now."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""We could take over the entire city.""
dialogueTree.text: "We could take over the entire city."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""Like a fucking *cobarde*... bitchm..."
dialogueTree.text: "Like a fucking *cobarde*... bitchman-Alain, shit..."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""Survivor guilt my ass, *I* wanted..."
dialogueTree.text: "Survivor guilt my ass, *I* wanted to go that way!"

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""Shame... (hic) burns worse than fi..."
dialogueTree.text: "Shame... (hic) burns worse than fire, man..."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""I'm the lucky fuck, who didn't tak..."
dialogueTree.text: "I'm the lucky fuck, who didn't take a scratch." (Sighs.)

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""Ain't no one gonna be riding any b..."
dialogueTree.text: "Ain't no one gonna be riding any ballads about me..."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""Shanky's gonna get a lesson in Boo..."
dialogueTree.text: "Shanky's gonna get a lesson in Boogie Street justice."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""Gonna hunt that rat-faced fuck dow..."
dialogueTree.text: "Gonna hunt that rat-faced fuck down."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""For Titus... for Glenny... for......"
dialogueTree.text: "For Titus... for Glenny... for... for Titus!!!"

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""When it's done I'll just blow my b..."
dialogueTree.text: "When it's done I'll just blow my brains out... Fuck everything."

dialogueTree.title: Alain: ""Boogie street justice. Gonna make..."
dialogueTree.text: "Boogie street justice. Gonna make you proud, T."
